Question.Subject: keeping my anonimity with my email address?
Question.Content: for certain email correspondence, it is important for me that i maintain a certain amount of anonimity (nothing illegal or nasty), but for various reasons, plus I do not really like the idea of people possibly knowing my private information. How can i be sure of keeping this anonimity and knowing that the recipient cannot know who i am, and more importantly get hold of my private information? Can anyone help please?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Get a Yahoo email. Or hotmail. Or gmail. Or any of the 1000's of other free webmails available. http://www.hotmail.com/ http://mail.yahoo.com/ http://mail.google.com/ http://www.inbox.com/ http://webmail.aol.com/ http://mail.lycos.com/
...

Answer.Content:
